survey_name: Office Noise Levels and Productivity Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employees' perceptions of office noise levels and their impact on productivity and overall work experience.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall noise level in your primary workspace?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clear differentiation. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button display.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Mandatory question.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall noise level in your primary workspace?

questions.question_text: Which of the following noise sources most frequently disrupt your concentration? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections and include an 'Other' option with text field. Optimize for tablet and desktop touch selection.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an optional open-text field for 'Other'.

questions.question_text: On average, how many times per day do you feel your workflow is interrupted by noise?
